Blog.post: Well another eventful Friday... I guess. Actually did something worth some time and effort. Delivered some furniture to Becky and rolled in some dough at the same time. It was a long day at work but I had fun tonight. Ran around town with the dubbers and went to Buffalo Wild Wings for some drinks. Of course I didnt drink because I refuse to drive even after one. So I just drank my sweet tea . The exciting life of Preston. Well that's it for now. Going to a welcome home fromAfgan party tomorrow. Probably have a few drinks and have a good day. Talk to you all in the future.
urlLink My car on the left and a friend of mine Alex's car on the right. Its a Jetta. Its slow but its nice. Just kidding Alex. Sweet ride brother. urlLink
urlLink Lots of Ink on me. More to come too! urlLink
urlLink My back. Umm.... You guess. I don't know. urlLink
urlLink Left Arm funky tribal thingy. urlLink
urlLink My forearms. Water and Fire Tribal. urlLink
urlLink My right arm tats. Mickey Mouse upside down and color tribal. urlLink
urlLink Me hard at work with Danie on the phone trying to figure out my finances. Yuk. urlLink
I'm still trying to find pictures of the rest of my family. I'll do what I can to get everyone on here.
I don't seem to have any pictures of my mom. Guess I've just always been used to her taking pictures of me since that's how I grew up; was in front of the camera. Sorry Mom. I suck.
urlLink Me goofin off after work getting ready to go home for the day. urlLink
urlLink My Platoon. We've always gotta have a goof ball. urlLink
urlLink This is a picture of 2 dolphins. If you don't see 2 dolphins then you are over stressed. urlLink
urlLink Told you it was random picture day. urlLink
urlLink My best buddy Mr. Ed... hhmmm what were we doing that day? I wonder? urlLink
urlLink Yes shaving my beret. ooh fun.. Look I had hair. Ok its random picture day sorry. urlLink
urlLink My big little brother James. urlLink
urlLink My sweet little sister Lex. urlLink
urlLink My pops! Love ya dad. urlLink
urlLink My best friend in the whole wide world and his lovely wife. Brian and Stacey. Good luck with your new house. urlLink
urlLink As requested. Another pic of me at work. woopee! urlLink

Today is my dad's Birthday. Happy birthday Dad. I love you and thank you for everything you've done for me. Thanks for bringing me up right. I think I turned out alright anyways. So from me to you dad, Happy Birthday. Love Preston.
urlLink Wouldnt be a complete post if there wasn't a picture of my car. Yes its a Dub. urlLink
urlLink One of my soon to be Ranger soldiers. "SILKY-T" as he likes to be called. He cracks me up. urlLink
urlLink Wow I just look extatic don't I. Actually that was a good day. We had a lot of fun. Basically because we didnt really do a lot of work.... in the office anyways. urlLink
urlLink MMMM.... Chili Powder is good. We used the whole thing in the chili. It was still weak. urlLink

urlLink We made Chili in a turkey frier. Yah yah... I know its a turkey frier not a chili cooker. But it worked out so well. This is Barry. Or as I like to call him. Mr. Reed. Not sure what he was up to here. urlLink
urlLink Its me.. woopeee!!! urlLink

Well I'm gonna try this blogger thingy out I guess. It'll give me something to do now that I will be home alone most of the time. I'll try my best to keep this updated so you all can keep checkin out the site and all the pics I'll post from around here at Bragg and around my home. Enjoy

Saturday had to go into work. Blah I hate work. Anyways. Just a few more days and I'm back at home for a few weeks. Dreading the drive but it always seems to pay off in the end. I'll probably be leaving early in the morning around midnight. Ok that's really early. Hopefully that will put me home around noon and I'll hit my mom's Ice cream shop first. Good ice cream after a long trip should do me justice. Anyways. Life around here is just full of drama so I'm glad to be getting out of here for a while. My new room mate will be moving in some of his stuff today. That'll be cool he can help look after the animals. I have to take some stuff to Becky so she can watch the cat while I'm gone. I'll be taking the camera with me and will post what I can from my dads lightning fast connection (dial-up). If I have problems posting I'll just update this way for now until I get back. urlLink

Well another eventfully boring week. I went to work, went to bed, got up went to work, blah blah blah. You all know the routine. Anyways. I'm going on leave back home to Illinois on Monday for 2 weeks. I'll try to post here if I can.
urlLink Jetta and R32. Do it. urlLink
urlLink Another shot of me and Alex's cars. urlLink
urlLink My car. What can I say. I love this car. urlLink
urlLink We like our cars. Can you tell? urlLink
urlLink Preston, Alex, and John. urlLink
urlLink A little sepia art to our cars. Thought it looked good so I decided it would be a keeper. urlLink
urlLink We went to the range today. Ammo didnt show up on time so we left. I got a pic for those of you who want one. urlLink
urlLink Little brother on the left. Big brother on the right. urlLink
urlLink Lindsay's car. I'd trade her my R32 for this car. This thing is wicked fast. Its so much fun to drive too. She would trade me though. I have to say I love this car. urlLink
urlLink Mike's 2.0 should be a lot faster by now. Hope it all worked out ok. Sweet ride brother. urlLink
urlLink Nice break light Nick. Why doesnt it go off? urlLink
urlLink Mike, Nick and Dan. You'd think we all like Vdubs or something. urlLink
urlLink The Man of the hour. Alex. He doenst even know he's walking at this point. He only remembers up till about 3pm and this was around 6pm. He had fun though. urlLink
Well I'm back from leave. Yes is was fun and exciting. I had the best time of my life. Probably the most fun I've ever had. Anyways. Back to the old grind at work. I'll post some pics later.
